exact_source: Exercise of the Stage 2 Option is conditional upon completion of Stage 1, the commencement of a Board approved drilling campaign... (for Cummins Project). Exercise of the Stage 2 Option is conditional upon the completion of Stage 1, commencement of a Board approved drilling campaign... (for Harris Greenstone Project). (No specified meterage/cost for the drilling campaigns; Core Energy to fund tenement upkeep - statutory minimums, not specified).
